title: Auth0 Account Link orgsupport
name: auth0-account-link-orgsupport
author: auth0 (organization support by Cloudworks AS)
description: This extension gives Auth0 customers the ability to allow their users to link their accounts. This version supports organizations.

CUSTOM_CSS.description: Add custom styles to the linking page of the extension.

auth0.scopes: read:connections read:users read:rules create:rules update:rules delete:rules delete:clients
